meta.name: description
meta.content: Franklin Park SD 84 is located in Franklin Park, IL.

div.p: All Franklin Park District 84 buildings will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school term and all classes will be conducted via Distance Learning. Daily prepackaged lunches for community members 18 years and younger will be available for pick-up.

h2.a: Welcome to Franklin Park School District 84

img.alt: Welcome to Franklin Park School District 84 Image

div.div: The mission of Franklin Park School District 84 is to provide all our children a quality education within a safe and nurturing environment that motivates them to be lifelong learners and morally responsible citizens.

article.aria-label: Tentative Last Day of School (Report cards sent home with students)

h3.a: Tentative Last Day of School (Report cards sent home with students)
